title: [Visual bug] Ward turning into a big ol pink box!
body:
So the new star guardian ward thats obtained via the event, right now is a bit broken. 
If you place it ANYWHERE aside from in lane, it turns into a big pink box. Put it in a bush? Box. Put it in Baron? Box. Dragon? Box. Bushes? BOX.[Its broken, fam.](https://68.media.tumblr.com/0e6151ed76218051aabaff52ab8c6f12/tumblr_inline_ow4z9eG04k1sexefj_540.png)

Edit: I don't know if this makes any difference, but it was a ranked game.

replies.body: I didn't have that problem, might have something to do with your computer, or this only happens for some people.
It wasn't only me who could see it, my whole team could as well!
